resources.string: "Turn on brush and get to brushing! "
"Something went wrong. Please try again later."
"The connection with your toothbrush has been lost. Wait for it to reconnect or restart your brushing session later."
"Quitting this page will cancel the on-going purchase"
"Start browsing our shop, motivational message here"
"Before you embark on your rewarding (literally) journey to better oral health, it’s important to see how you’re brushing naturally."
"Skip the guesswork, and get the facts."
"Guided brushing can help you do your best"
"We’ll coach you through a full-length brushing activity to maintain good coverage, angle, and speed."
"Earn 2 points each time you play, up to 6 points per day."

"how would you rate your current
oral care routine?"

"how often do you suffer with
gum or tooth sensitivity? "

"what would you most want
to work on today?"
"I brush 2 minutes, at least 2 times a day"
"I brush 2 minutes, at least 1 time a day"
"I brush 1 minute, at least 1 time a day"
"You must have a smart toothbrush connected to your device to test the program"
"Use a smart toothbrush to get results"
"Get the most out of your data"
"Help us improve the accuracy of the motion sensors by sending us your brushing data anonymously"
"Connect your brush to get access to your data, see how you really brush, and get rewarded for your hard work!"

"You earned a smile point by downloading this app. Your awesome brushing reign now begins!
Every 100 smile points earned equals $1 that can be redeemed in the shop for refills, new brushes, and more. Use your points at any time, no red tape."
"The way you brush your teeth is as unique as your fingerprints. Your results show exactly where you brushed and where you missed."
"You don't always have to brush with your app open to keep track of your progress. But, brushing with the app helps you improve your brushing in real time with activities like…"
"Earn smile points every time you brush."
"Keep track of all the points you earn here, on your Frequency Chart"
"Did you know: Most people miss 40% of their teeth when brushing. Let's see how you did!"
"When you’re done, just turn off the brush."
"start brushing normally and turn your brush off when done."
"Do you really want to delete these brushings? This action is irreversible."
"Missing a spot - or two, or three? Racing through it? Let's test how you brush."
"Not too slow, not too fast. Find the speed that's just right for cleaner smiles."
"Angle to fight plaque and brush your best."

plurals.name: earning_points_subtitle
plurals.item: "You earn %1$d point every time you brush."
"You earn %1$d points every time you brush."

resources.string: "Something went wrong when taking a picture"
"Something went wrong when selecting a picture"
"Something went wrong loading the picture from the gallery"
"Please accept Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy before proceeding"
"Something went wrong. Please try again later."
"Android requires Location permission to connect any Bluetooth Low Energy device. Please enable it in the following dialog to connect your toothbrush."
"Android requires activated Location to connect any Bluetooth Low Energy device. Please turn it on in the following dialog to connect your toothbrush."
"Are you really sure you want to delete your account? This operation is not reversible."
"An email allowing you to retrieve all your data will be sent to %s shortly."
"Do you really want to log out?"

Each time you brush, you receive at least 1 smile point. You can have 3 eligible brushing sessions a day. Earn more smile points by completing activities and challenges.

Use the Shop in the app to redeem your smile points for rewards.*

100 smile points = $1 discount*

smile points expire December 31 of the following year or when you deactivate or otherwise cancel your account.*
"The toothbrush that knows you,\nthe app that shows you."
"Press the power button or shake your toothbrush if it's already on."
"Do you see the blue light blinking on your brush?"
"No need to remember a long or hard to type password"
"We just emailed you a link to log in with. For security purposes, the link expires after 30 mins."
"You need an email address to access your data."
"Keep it interesting with activities to help improve your brushing and earn points fast."
"Use your smile to change the world, don’t let the world change your smile!"
"Your brush needs to charge for 24 hours prior to using it for the first time."
"You need an email address to access your account."
"We detected the hum toothbrush.\nTo optimize your brushing experience we recommend you switch to the hum app."
"If your toothbrush is near but doesn’t appear here, it may be because:"
"• it’s already connected to another device"
"Turn it on, deactivate the bluetooth or forget the toothbrush on the other device."
"You should now see your toothbrush in the list!"

"The best smiles are more than a look, they're a feeling. And we believe that brushing your teeth should make you feel great. That's why we created hum; a brush that's all about making it easier to brush better."
"We're elevating oral care and using connected technology to stop cavities, decay and oral diseases!"
"To connect your toothbrush, please activate Bluetooth on your device"
"Tap wherever you see a tour point like this one to help you find your way around!"
"In order to add a new toothbrush, you need to forget the one that is connected."
"New firmware update available for your brush!"
"Wait, I'm trying to find your toothbrush"
"Watch your brush angle and speed to help you clean those nooks and crannies where plaque loves to hide."
"Brush with >80% once per day for 5 days"
"Brush with >80% twice per day for 5 days"
"Discover our Guided brushing! The best way to get results"
"You can brush with us even while you are away from your phone. Try it?"
"Improve your coverage! Brush better for 5 days"
"Improve your frequency! Brush twice a day for 5 days"
"Improve your coverage! Brush twice a day and brush better"
"Do your first guided brushing today ; the best way to get results !"
"You have successfully completed the challenge. We’ve added 1 point to your balance."
"Brush offline today and then check your app to see how you just did"
"You have successfully completed the challenge. We’ve added 1 point to your balance."
"Brush for 5 consecutive days with your smart toothbrush and earn some points"
"You have successfully completed the challenge. We’ve added 2 points to your balance."
"Brush for 5 days with at least 80% coverage each time and earn more smile points"
"You have successfully completed the challenge. We’ve added 5 points to your balance."
"Brush twice a day for 5 consecutive days with your smart toothbrush and earn some points"
"You have successfully completed the challenge. We’ve added 4 points to your balance."
"Brush twice a day for 5 days with at least 80% coverage each time and earn some smile points"
"Brush twice a day for 5 days with at least 80% coverage"
"You have successfully completed the challenge. We’ve added 10 points to your balance."
"To prevent toothbrush downtime, during the update process:"
"1. Please keep the firmware upgrade interface open and do not exit"
"2. Make sure the mobile phone and the toothbrush are within 9 feet"
"Hang tight! You’ll be able to close this window when the update is complete."
"You’re good to go now! After closing this window you can start using your toothbrush."
"3. Please put your toothbrush on the charger to continue"
"Please put your toothbrush on the charger to continue"
"The toothbrush cannot be updated at the moment."
"Well done %1$s! You’ve collected %2$s, which is %3$s to spend in the shop!"
"You have successfully completed the challenge, and we’ve added %s to your balance."
"You have entered an invalid address, please try again"
"Earn 2 smile points every time you play, and up to 6 points a day!"
"Toothbrush failed to update, start the recovery!"
"Your brush needs to be updated before using it. Please start the update now."
"brushing too fast can damage your gums"
"Evaluate and improve your technique by maintaining a good brushing speed for 7 seconds on each segment."
"Earn 2 smile points each time you play, up to 6 points per day."
"Please put your toothbrush on the charger to continue"
"Please put your toothbrush on the charger to continue"
"The internet connection appears to be offline."

"*See our Rewards Terms & Conditions for additional information. A brushing session must achieve more than 50% coverage and last longer than 30 seconds to be eligible for smile points. If you brush twice within 30 minutes we will combine the sessions and data into one recorded session."
"Come back tomorrow to answer a different question and ear more smile points"
"Turn on your brush and start brushing!"
"Receive notifications when you haven’t synced your brush for several days."
"Turn this on if you would like to receive information about products and services you may like. You can opt-out at any time."

plurals.name: question_of_the_day_correct_answer_body
plurals.item: "Congratulations! %1$s Point have been added to your account."
"Congratulations! %1$s Points have been added to your account."

resources.string: "Don’t worry, you can play again tomorrow there’s a new question and chance to earn points."
"Something when wrong, please check your internet connection."
"Set your reminder to brush twice a day."
"Simple and short explanation should be here in two rows"
"A friendly reminder to sync your brushing data"
"Simple and short explanation should be here in two rows"
"We're almost 100% connected. Complete your profile now."
"How effective was your recent brushing? Sync to find out."
"Is your toothbrush nearby? Sync your brushing!"
"Sync your toothbrush to update your brushing indicators."
"Remember to sync your brushing to maximize your Hum experience!"
"Want to know more about dental health? Touch to sync your brushing."
"Are your near your toothbrush? Touch to sync your brushing!"
"Tap to sync your brushing and update your dental report."
"Sync your toothbrush to save your recorded data even if you have brushed without opening the Hum app"
"Want to know if how well you brushed over the last few days? Sync your brushing with the Hum app."
"Remember to sync your brushing from time to time so Hum can analyze your dental health!"
"Sync your brushing now to check your progress."
"You have successfully completed %1$s task, we’ve added %2$s to your balance."
"Check our customers support center for common questions."
"No smile points history yet. Win and synchronize your smile points to see the events."
"Check our oral health care center for common questions."
"We need more information in order to provide you with the most accurate results."
"It looks like your brush %s is running on low battery. make sure to charge it soon."
"Use one of the connected toothbrushes to start your guided brushing session."
"Please enable push notifications for Hum to use the reminders."
"it's time for a new brush head"
"We noticed you've used your current brush head for 3 months, which means it's time to replace it."
"View our Help Center or get the assistance you need"

Connect your account with Amazon Alexa to receive email and Alexa voice notifications when your toothbrush head needs to be replaced. You can also choose to set up smart reorders from Amazon so you never run out.
"Tap allow to link your account with Alexa."
"Do you really want to unlink your Amazon account?"

Your hum by Colgate is now linked with Alexa. You will receive email and Alexa voice notifications when your toothbrush head needs to be replaced.

You can set up smart reorders or manage your notification settings at any time by navigating to your Devices within the Alexa App and clicking on “Supply”.
"Failed to link the account. Please try again."
"Yes, I want to receive promotions and updates (optional)"
"Receive reminder notifications when it’s time to brush. You can set up to 3 daily notifications."
"Unlock a 60 day free trial of Headspace"
"Explore guided exercises, videos, and more to help you get healthier and happier. 10 Days of Headspace can increase happiness by 16%."
"The code will be valid for 30 days after unlocking."
"Use the code below at registration to enjoy 60 days free trial. The code will be valid for 30 days after unlocking."
"Discount code not available, please try again later."
"Hold your brush at a 45 degree angle towards your teeth, not straight on."
"How to brush your inner front teeth"
"Tilt the brush slightly vertically and make several gentle and short (tooth-wide) up-and-down strokes."
"Not enough coverage or duration to earn points."
"Interested in having some fun as you brush?\nCheck out or games."
